author: modena
title: Wow! Bricks rock!
review:
I have no idea where I got this set, but I definitely have those parts!

Pros

  • Propeller!
  • Nice colours!
  • Printed tail brick with a "2"!
  • Landing gear!
  • Plates!

Cons

  • Easy to build.

Overall:

This was a great set. I still keep the parts, and they work well! I never built this set, but the landing gear works well for the size of the plane. The parts are shining, and what's better than the 4017 is that this one scores higher with the design of the set!

I have nothing else to say, but if you see this set, buy it!
